name: ChaosFly
description:
“Hi there, I am lieutenant Allen. I’m handing over the task to you, so you will be piloting the spaceship to reach all 5 planets. Because our main pilot got sick and couldn’t go. Do you think you can handle the task?”

Control:
Left-Arrow: Move Left
Right-Arrow: Move Right
Up-Arrow: Speed Up or Down-Arrow: Speed Down

ESC: Pause/Resume

Welcome to ChaosFly a 2d pixel art rocket game where your main goal is to make it from one planet to another and avoid the obstacles on your way.

We would love it if you could report any bugs you find in the comments so we can quickly and swiftly fix them, if there is anything you wanna know do not be afraid to send us a message on discord and we will see what we can do. 

Thanks for playing our game
